content.detailedDescription: I was looking at centipede-looking chemytails, no craft observed. cloud was in the middle pf a cloudless sky at the time. upon looking at the digital photo, the craft is revealed. that is the firest three pictures. the last picture taken 12/17/13 at 12:30pst showing an orlike craft emitting cloud or chemtrail upward, and then spreading out in a v shpe as it hits prevailing winds.
content.summary: See picture, craft inside chemtrail

content.detailedDescription:
The four video clips uploaded: ufo's 12 15 2013, numbers, 001,002,006, and 007 are unaltered, and were loaded into my computer. my significant other took the movies on a tripod we have ready to go, and a general electric camera with 14.1 megapixels. 001, is 1 second long, 002 is 5 seconds long, 006, is 26 seconds long, and 007 is one minute and 54 seconds long. all videos are the same object.

the fifth video clip uploaded titled satellite 003.Mov, is 2 minutes and 26 seconds long, and we don't know if this is a satellite or ufo.

on the 15th of december, we let our dogs out to go to the bathroom before bed. we wanted to see the object we photographed three days prior, which is titled satellite 003.Mov. we named it that because we didn't know if the object that had suddenly showed up in our backyard sky for the last three weeks was a ufo or a satellite. this took place on the 12th of december. the date and time was not set. i posted this on facebook to see what my friends thought. ufo or satellite. it was posted on facebook on december 14, 2013. 

we looked up at the first object we were checking on, and there were eighteen or more ufo's dancing around the first object we took a movie of three days earlier. we ran in the house to get the tripod and camera, and my other half was trying to film them all, and couldn't because the weather was so cold that the camera wouldn't take pictures. we went into the house, and my other half warmed up the camera, i turned on the computer, so we could download the movies and/or photo's when we were done. 

we went back outside, and there were still five objects circling the object. my other half found one object to focus on, as the others were too spread out to fit in the frame without panning, and most likely not get a good picture of anything. four out of seven clips turned out. we went into the house to see what we had. it was very cold to stay out there too long.

my computer screen was black, and my computer was suddenly off. i had it hooked up to the television set, and saw a screen that said my computer was unable to boot, and had to try to do a repair and restore., so i pushed the button that it said to from the tv screen, and it repaired it. we downloaded the video's. 

later that morning we were going into town, and my other half's cell phone was in the same condition my computer was in. not working, and a blank screen. we took it to radio shack, and it was rebooted some how. 

for the many ufo's to go forward, backward, up, down, and around as if dancing together we know what we saw, and filmed. someone asked me if it could have been from the comet that recently went by. that is impossible as fragments from asteroids, or comet fragments do not make intelligent dance moves across the sky. 

i smiled, and thought to myself wow!, post something on facebook like that, and suddenly we have lots of visitors. my other half feels wonderful about it, as he has had several intense up close sightings in the past, and now he has validation that those events happened. i also have validation. 

it's real!!!!!
content.summary: we went outside to see if we could see any more ufo activity, and saw 18+ craft in the sky. camera froze from cold, computer had to be restored, and cell phone. went out about 1/2 hour later

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving south on us 127 passing i69 when the entire western sky lit up green, then blue, then flashed red for almost three minutes. i've never seen something like this before. i know this was not a transformer blowing up also. it was the entire sky, and stayed lit for several seconds. the first flag was green which lasted about 20 seconds, a, then it flashed green again, then blue which lasted several more seconds, once that was fully lit up in the sky, it immediately turned red and continued to flas red for about a minute, making this occurrence lasting about 2-3 minutes. again i've never sen something like this, it almost seemed as if someone let a bomb off in the sky. it was a terrifying experience, and i would really like to know what is was so i can sleep better at night.
content.summary: The entire western sky lit up green, then blue, then red for at least 3-5minutes

content.detailedDescription: My cousin was at a party, but the only reason i am reporting is because i know he does not use any kind of drugs and because he has it on tape. i saw it this morning, when he e-mailed me the photo and the video. everyone was going outside to see it, the big red ball of light, that suddenly stopped in midair and took off at amazingly high speed going who knows where.  its been sometime since something is recorded in brazil, so i thought it was worth the share.
content.summary: A red glowing sphere appeared moving slow, stopped and took off quickly.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst traveling home from work i was approaching a junction so i was beginning to slow down when to the left of my view about 20ft in the air was a slow moving object that resembled a ball of fire with lots of different colours omitting from it, my first reaction was what the hell is that and why has it not falling out of the sky because it was traveling so slow, at that point it travelled straight over the top of my car, i observed it through my sun roof at that point i stopped it then disappeared over a hedge, i could not understand how it did not hit the trees that were only about 50 yards away, i got out of the car but could not see where it gone to over the next few weeks i watched the news and the papers to see if there had been any damage to houses or property or if anyone else had seen anything but nothing to this day it has always been on my mind and there has never been able to explain what it was or how it did not hit a building or a tree i don't talk much about it now because no one believes you
content.summary: Fire ball like object traveling slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I reported this to mufon on jan. 5, year was 2010 or 2011.
i was with my sister lorena st. clair she saw it all first.
i was afraid to tell you this, i not crazy!
towands the end of the event (a text beeped)
at 1:25am) the text was sent from my cell phone number, the number at the time was 510-486-7368, if i remember correctly. im noy crazy and don't make things up an neither does my sister.
***i had a text message***
it said---(hello) just --hello--
i wrote back do you need help!  there was no more communication. 
other things have happened through our lives, we never mentioned! you may contact me and mt sister at any time.My sister can help with information. it was over (lake alhambra) in antioch, ca. 94509
we have had other sitings and an events i dont underdtand and afraid to talk about. contact us if you like.
thank you!
and
sincerely,
jeannelle white
content.summary: Pink oval and a white blue oval. a little orange. looked like a sunset. why didbi have a text that came from my phone number (hello)

content.detailedDescription: My partner has reported to me that while on his travels back to his home town, he was passing through the small town of peterborough in south australia, sometime after this he reported to me that a strange orange shaped ball was following him, which he could see out of his window just above the tree top at the time he was doing atleast 140km/h and it was keeping up with his speed. he said that it followed him for some time running in a horizontel direction to his window and that at one stage it also effected his car eletrics. the radio and head lights on his car started to fade on and off and also the car engine started chugging and was almost about to die. this happened for about 20 seconds or so, then the strange orange orb disapeared into no where like it had just faded out and the car suddenly came back to normal. around 10 - 15 mins later, driving through a hilly area, in the middle of no where. still doing at least 140km/h he came to a windy road, where he almost crashed his car because there was something standing in the middle of the road which looked human/alien like, but he reported it was altho it was almost covered in a white bedsheet. he doesnt recall going through peterborough.
content.summary: Orange orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the kitchen, having a drink (approx 3.30am) looking out from the kitchen window.
i noticed a very bright white light (almost tear drop shaped) in the sky which appeared low and quite close, i opened the window to see if i could hear anything (rule out helicopter) and there was no noise, certainly wasn't a plane, nothing i could think of fitted its description.
then the light/object just dropped at very high speed at angle behind the house at the back of my garden. this all happened in about 5-10 seconds.
it almost left a tail in its wake where it moved so quickly.
i was gobsmacked (never seen anything like it before) and kept trying to move my head to see if it was my eyes catching a light (it definately wasn't).
content.summary: Bright static light over bracknell - rapidly descended

content.detailedDescription: At 7:40 in the evening, went outside and noticed a bright white light above the tree line. i assumed it to be a plane, then saw two more lights appear next to it. still thinking of planes, thought they were too close and i was about to witness a crash. in that same second, more lights came into view and the original 3 faded. there had to be around a dozen or more, however their lights all kept fading in and out. as soon as one faded in, another faded out. they were not in a straight line, rather they were almost like a scattered zigzag. i was unable to count them due to their fading in and out (and when this occurred, it wasn't all of them at the same time.As one would fade out 2 or 3 more would fade in). they were slowly moving towards the grovetown area and were spotted above the tree line right outside fort gordon in between gates 1 and 2. after close to 3 minutes of observation, one went bright orange (the light emitted was significantly bigger), then faded out. immediately after, another did the same to the left of the first one ( all while the other white lights were still fading in and out). then a third. they continued slow movement afterwards towards the grovetown area, two broke away and were slowly coming in the direction of my house.As they were too close for comfort, i immediately ran inside locking the doors. i looked out again 2 minutes later and observed 2 lights still lingering. then about 3 minutes later heard a helicopter and looked out the window again; the unknown lights were gone, however the helicopter circled the area for a good 5 minutes. i did try to record the lights on my iphone, they didn't pick up though, which is unusual because they weren't that exceptionally far. i was scared and shaking though and was more interested in keeping my eyes on whatever they were while fumbling to turn my recorder on, on my phone.
content.summary: Fleet of flickering ufo's with 3 turning bright orange outside of ft gordon

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside having a cigarette with a few friends of mine. looking up i witnessed what i thought at first was the international space station, as it was fairly bright and moving at a good clip. when suddenly it stopped.  i have never in my life ever seen anything like this. it began, to move back and forth in quickly, changing direction every 30 to 45 seconds. it would then stop and hover. there is no doubt in my mind this object was at a very high altitude. i have been an avid stargazer for my whole life. i have seen a lot of amazing things. nothing compares to what i just witnessed. it actually drove me to call the state police to report it. someone has to have seen this. it was truely amazing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star like object that moved in quick random directions. was viewed for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
7 of us were traveling home in separate cars and witnessed 6 orange, star-like objects traveling east from a westward direction.  they were in a formation of 3 with 3 directly below.   2 moved closely together and at that point we realized they were not planes. they burned out one by one.

the photos attached were images captured by 3 different camera phones.
content.summary: 6 starl like objects traveling in pairs

content.detailedDescription: I have already filed two reports of abductions that i could sort of remember. eddie middleton had contacted me to investigate but i feel that i was not completely truthful. i can't remember what takes place during the abductions. and most of the time i cant even remember seeing them when they take me. a few minor memories had managed to leak through and from them i was compelled to fill out my first two reports. when eddie middleton called me, i told him that i didnt have nightmares and that i didn't feel that these things had caused me any problems. however, that was and is not the case. they're still coming for me. i wouldn't know if it weren't for a combination of other witnesses and remembering the power going out in my bedroom. the odd thing with the power is that it only goes out in the bedroom alone. i do still have nightmares. and i would say i have some "slight" emotional problems due to this. i've been completely devoid of emotion since they started coming back. i sleep ten hours, but feel like i havent slept at all. i cannot go to sleep until at least 5 am. i am overcome with paranoia at night. i have strange headaches and i do have a strange mark on my side that looks like some of the flesh was scooped out. i really, really want a hypnotherapist. i just have to ease these feelings of agitation and frustration. i dont know where they come from. i know they come. i'm not sure how often they take me. it's not just me in this area either. there are several people from this area who get taken. i've spoken with them. i'm ready to get to the bottom of this. and stare this darkness in the face. i'm tired of being afraid. it's really shitting up my life.
content.summary: Ongoing abductions

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my bed.  i heard my own voice say "its better if it happens this way" then i heard a beeewwwoooooop, beeewwoooooopp.  and was sourrounded by this green light.  it was like all digital.  i got up and ran outside and stoop at my front door and saw a triangular space craft flying about 15 feet from me making this sound like wooop woooop wooop woooop.  it had these blue and red lights on it that were alternating their flash.  each flash lasted about a second.  it had a solid bright white light at its peak.  i heard it say "its better if it happens this way because that was what i was saying before i went to prison.  i had just gotten out of prison that day.  while i was there i read this book called "behold a pale horse" by william cooper.  in it out found confirmation that they could have abducted me while i was in the marine corps and stationed in 29 palms, ca.  it said there was this base somewhere around "yucca valley"  well yucca valley is the closest city to 29 palms.  29 palms is huge and is more remote than area 51.  they do a lot of the same stuff out there like test experimental aircraft and test nuclear weapons.  i am going to write another report about that dated july 6 2005.
content.summary: Spaceship came to see me

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from a meeting with my co-workers when we observed two rows of evenly spaced lights. at first we assumed they were stunt planes but as they started to tumble down they stayed in perfect synchronization. i continued driving fascinated by the tumbling object. then it disappeared.
content.summary: Crazy tylenol with lights disenegrated before hitting the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out at mike sirek's house with adam morse.  i told him i went to a mufon symposium that morning.  i assumed what i was looking at was venus or saturn, maybe a satelite.  we tried to look at it with mikes telescope but it was a crappy telescope so we couldn't see much.  we watched it while the sun came up.  it was like a gold ord that floated in the eastern sky for a couple of hours.  it was about a mile away.  as we watched it a smaller blue orb flew past the object and launched a red orb at the gold orb and nothing happened after that.  the blue orb was flying very fast for the hieght it must have been.  im not sure what that would be.  we went back inside and when we cme back out the gold orb was gone.
content.summary: Saw an orb

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to court to testify against someone who robbed my house.  i was driving to hastings, mn.  i crossed south robert trail and as i puled through the light i saw the same triangular space ship i saw outside my house on january 6th 2010.  this time it was during the day.  it looked like it had three sides and a base.  the side facing me was an equilateral triangle that was shining from the sun shimmering white/silver.  i pulled out my cell phone and hit the camera button.  my phone froze and instead went to the dial pad.  i tried to exit it and when i finally got the camera to come up. 15-20 had gone by.  when i looked up it was gone. and i was freaked out.  i called craig lang and reported this to him a couple of days later.
content.summary: Day time sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my girl friends house after i dropped off some christmas presents for her daughter.  i was driving north on highway 13 towards where it turns right back towards burnsville.  i was the ship fly in front of my car at about 150-200 ft.  it had a red light on one tip and a blue light on the other tip with a solid bright white light on the top of the craft.  i have seen this craft outside of my house close up on january 6th 2010 so i recognized it when it was flying in front of my car other wise it would have been very difficult to distinguish.  basically it just flew from east to west in front of my car and i tried to follow it but there were no roads going after it.  i saw it get far enough where it was almost out of sight and took a radical turn north or to the crafts right.  than it was out of sight and i tried to track it but it was gone.  i was than abducted on the 13th out of my home and i reported these events to craig lang.
content.summary: Saw the same ship again

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my living room on friday the 13th 2013.  i fell asleep sometime after 4am.  i remember only 3 things.  one was floating towards my garage door.  the next was getting a needle shoved in my belly button.  i felt the pain of it.  and the third was hearing a drill and feeling them shoving it up my nose and feeling he pain of that.  it was not overly painful but it did hurt.  my mom woke up at 7am so it happened sometime between 4am and 7am.  i was watching a television program about aliens when i went to bed and i woke up and wanted to believe that it was just a crazy dream but i have seen space ships in the past.  on friday evening i called my friend jj and told him about it.  he invited me to where he is and that was a master sweet at mystic lake casino.  i told him about it while his friend matt eastman slept.  matt called jj early on saturday and told him he left the hotel at around 7am in the morning to go let his dog out.  he called because he saw a flash of light fly in front of his car.  i said to him maybe it was a ghost.  he said "no way a ghost is this bright"  he went on to say the flash of light was the size of a "bus."
content.summary: I was abducted again

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the phone with a friend of mine, sitting in the living room of my apartment at the time.  i had been talking on the phone for probably 20 minutes, when i had the urge to look over to my left out the front window. 

i lived at the very back end of a cul-de-sac, on the first floor of a 2 story apartment building.  my living room window opened upon the cul-de-sac. lengthwise, allowing me to see the building on either side of the street, as well as the main road and houses on the other side, about 250 feet away. 

when i happened to look out my window, i saw a silver craft, hovering 10 feet or so directly over the house at the entrance to the cul-de-sac.  the craft was perfectly disc shaped, exactly like the shape that everyone assumes a ufo to look like, and virtually identical to the shape you have on the banner at the top of this page.  looking back on it, that stuck with me more than anything.  i always expected a ufo to look different from that.  but there it was, about 30 feet wide, 15 feet top to bottom, reflective silver throughout, no windows, no lights.  i observed it for 10-15 seconds before it accelerated instantaneously to an impossible speed and was gone from sight.  it took off so quickly that i was barely even able to tell that it had gone south or south-east, rather than just vanishing outright.  there was no sound, and as my computer was on as well as the phone, there were no interruptions on either.  

my first thought when i saw the object was surprise, then fear.  especially after it took off and i had time to process what i had seen.
content.summary: Observed briefly out of window, then it took off at impossible speed.

content.detailedDescription: I, along with a friend, was outside on a clear dark night, moon and stars visible. as i was looking up at the sky i was observing the stars. while doing so, i noticed there were four sphere/orb like objects moving. they were bright and orange in color. i alerted my friend as he also watched. the first two orbs were side by side with a gap in between. the other two were behind the first two, but spaced wider apart. they were moving in a formation at a smooth pace. there was no noise. as the formation approached near my vicinity, i began to hear dogs barking in the distance. when the formation began to pass, i noticed the orbs brightness begin to diminish (one by one) and eventually go dark. i got into my vehicle and began to drive, keeping my eyes in the sky. after 30 seconds, i noticed another bright, orange orb in the sky, approaching the same direction of the first four. i got out of my vehicle and again observed bright, orange orbs, but this time the orbs were in a straight path following one another. there was approximately 30 seconds of gap time from one orb to another with a total of 7 orbs. again, the flight of the orbs were a smooth pace, no noise, and as they passed my location, they would dim out and go dark one by one. naturally, at first, i thought the orbs were lights from an airplane, but as i watched them closely, i could tell they were not due to the precise smooth movement of them. also, before, during, and after, there were various airplanes in the area, as they normally are, and i could make out the difference between them. while this event was taking place, my friend just kept asking me, "what the hell are they?".
content.summary: 4 bright, orange orbs in formation, followed by 7 bright, orange orbs in a straight path.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was standing behind the house
2. i was looking at the moon it was 3/4
3. not sure what it was
4. it just suddenly was there it moved from the west to the east it moved
   with the clouds at the same rate as the clouds it was above the moon
   about 3 or 4 degrees  it moved a good distance then it was just gone 
5. i just watched it wondering what it might be 
6. it just was gone
content.summary: It went from the west to the east just above the moon looked the same size as the moon ,moon was 3/4

content.detailedDescription: Was letting dogs out.  saw the triangle emerge from a cloud watched in awe as it moved erratically in several directions.  it then pointed upward and to the north and disappeared behind another cloud.  there was no sound.  nothing else in the sky could be seen.  the lights were light "running lights" around the edges and two rear circular lights.  i was disappointed it did not last longer in view.  it appeared purposeful in its movements although erratic.  i was afraid i may be seen as it was dark and i had turned on all the lights and standing on my porch with the dogs.
content.summary: Just before sunrise appeared from clouds moved erratically in several directions then pointed north and disappeared behind another cloud.  appeared to have roundnd  light sources at wide rear of triangle and lit appearing "running lights"

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Seen hovering for several minutes, appeared as one object, then split into 3 and flew away. have seen several subsequent times since first sighting, approx. 3 additional times. lights on craft appears brighter when photographed, and feels as if you're being watched when seen.I was about a mile or so west of the object, getting dropped off at my house. i was looking into the horizon for no reason. i thought it was a cell tower, but realized it wasn't when it started to move. i saw it hover for several minutes, and then split into 3 different objects and fly away. it flew under the horizon eventually.
content.summary: Seen hovering for several minutes, appeared as one object, then split into 3 and flew away

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting on top of a bald near roan mountain injoying clear beautiful day myself and family member seen round sphere in the valley it should not be able to fly i asked her did you see that she said yes it disappeared instantly extreme speed or other we didn't know i knew what it was when first saw it it was moving quick in horizontal flight then gone i was dumbfounded i saw one other family member did not want to talk about it due to religious views
content.summary: Observed round sphere moving between mountains with another person then gone in instant

content.detailedDescription: Dec. 20 2013 5pm heading home from work. i just passed wg exit on the turnpike heading eastbound. the annoying usual as cars race to get around each other to get nowhere. i come around bend to long straight section of the turnpike heading toward rt. 1 and i observe 2 aircraft lights or so i thought. one was higher and further out above the clouds. it was bright for the distance but not as bright as object 2 and clearly was an aircraft of the usual kind seen every day. object two was much brighter,high but i would say just below the clouds. i thought it may have been another closer plane at first but it was a pulsating light which i thought was peculiar. as i watched i noticed it was not moving so i thought maybe a helicopter hanging around from the accident in the area earlier in the morning. as i closed in the object stayed in the same place i was getting closer to being under it and thought i might see something that would help identify it. the pulsing was about 1 second maybe slightly longer per pulse smooth from dim to bright no flicker or flutter. just as i was thinking i would get a better glimpse from under the object it got bright then vanished. just gone.  no further observation of the object. i'll accept any answers i can be offered and would like to know if anyone else reported seeing it. i do know that not everybody looks at the sky but my eyes don't miss when something is out of place up there.
content.summary: Pulsating light high just below cloud line aircraft were visible during observation last pulse bright then vanished. out of place.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there,
i live in mumbai india. it was friday the 20th of december 2013 at 8 pm. i am a member of a club with a large swimming pool in mumbai and it is located right off the arabian sea. 3 of my friends and i decided to spend the evening there. we entered at around 7.55 pm and were walking towards the club house which is located right next to the ocean. i did not notice the moon and there was a large light illuminating the swimming pool. the night sky over the ocean was pitch dark and i could see the stars very clearly. i am a very eager star gazer and take every opportunity to look at the night sky and so that day was no different and i did just that. i moved away from that bright light that was illuminating the pool to get a better look at the sky and to my surprise noticed this star like object but with a very strange deep orange glow to it. i called out to my friends who had settled down to a table placed on the lawn in front of the club house. they came to where i was standing and we all saw this strange light. there was something different about it, it was too orange for a normal star. it was twinkling to a point of giving off a pulsating effect and had an extended glowing effect at the bottom. we all realised this was not an aircraft or a helicopter as it seemed too high for a helicopter and in any case the whole so called craft was glowing with no strobe lights at all. it was approximately 45 degrees above the horizon right over the dark arabian sea and there were no other identifiable aircraft in the vicinity. after hovering for about 5 minutes it suddenly started moving to the right very slowly and gave the effect of actually disintigrating rather than disappearing into the night sky. it was an absolutely cloudless night, so there was no chance of cloud interference. we were all left startled but thought rationally but could not come upto a conclusion of what we saw was anything terrestrial!
content.summary: Bright orange star like object in western sky. hovering, then moves to the right and dissintigrates into the clear night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
*the questionnaire above brought back some memories, this happened about 3 years ago,, i just posted on nufon the other day.*
so im at my friends house,its 10 or 11pm and we go outside on his porch to have a cigarette. he starts telling me how hes seen strange flying things.. and im like," oh thats weird? you should get your eyes or head checked?" like it was weird... 1st time i ever had anyone tell me theyve seen ufos. so hes telling me weird stories and stuff. and nothings stuck out to me much but i didnt think he was crazy after he told me the stories about seeing far away things and strange lights in his room. i was still skeptical though...If i dont see it its not real. right? well, i guess the aliens agreed because after looking in the sky for about 3 minutes my friend shoots out of his seat and points up yelling look look!!! and above us is the most amazing thing ill ever see. this giant black silent triangle the size of a football field hovering on the treetops right above me and my friend. this happened 3 years ago in the pitch black so its hard to remember all the details, especially in that intense moment, or about three or four minutes.When i first adjusted my eyes a couple 5 times i asked my friend if it was a prank or a joke, when obviously it wasnt,but i still asked.I told myself when i was looking at it i would never belive myself so i just said to myself as clearly as i could." alex this is real this is unbeliveable though". and i look back and try to convince myself it was just my eyes playing tricks but i know this thing was something else. i kind of think i saw engravings in this giant ship mabey like a picture or something writing or something for space aerodynamics i dont really know it looked like i saw some engravings in this dark black ship. the sides of the ship looked like it was multiple stories tall with an awning and deck kinda thing like the ones in star wars lol. i kinda think i remember faint lights at the corners but idk it was weird probably got abducted ahaha.... but ya not kidding.. after hovering above us for a few minutes it just went back the direction it came about 300 yards silently and straight then just zoomed off. my friend said that was the closest and craziest one hes ever seen too. never seen one sence then, and its 2013 about 3 or 4 years ago this was. sorry idk the date but it was 2009-2011 and it was cold out
content.summary: Bizarre. 1st convo i ever had about ufos then i see, undoubtedly, a triangle ufo hovering above me and my friend silently

content.detailedDescription: At around 2100 on december 13th 2013 my son and i were driving nb on the 210 freeway near sylmar/san fernando area after leaving a friends house in tujunga ca. as my son and i were driving home, he said to me as he pointed to the sky "is that a planet or something like that, what is that?" he is 18 years old and is a typical teenager that never has said much about ufo's or anything related to the subject. i then  looked at what he was looking at. i was driving so i could not take a long look at it, but did look several times as my son also pointed out that it wasn't moving. i thought it was an airplane because this is near the flight path to burbank airport, but sure enough the two lights we were watching hadn't moved. the two orange lights were very close together as if they overlapped like a tangent geometry. another thing i noted at the time which also raised my curiosity was the fact that there were no visible running lights on this object. i was still thinking this was probably an airplane just really far away and that could explain the color of the lights and their lack of separation and it was also night with nothing to gage distance to the object with. after observing the object for a few minutes, both my son and i were convinced that it was not moving. we finally passed by a big rig that blocked our view of the object and when we were able to see the sky the object was in again, it had vanished. gone, just like it was never there. that's my story and i'm sticking to it.
content.summary: Two orange lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the sunset and later when reviewing the photos.  i discovered  an object  above the palm trees on left side of picture. this is just a speck until zoomed in on.  i would like somebody to use whatever  they can to bring thing object  out.  make it more clear in other words.  i did  not notice any airplane or object itself while photographing.
thanks
content.summary: No wings,  silent.,  did not see until i observed photo

content.detailedDescription:
Work night shift at a bar and there was commotion outside and saw other individuals looking at some bright lights.

description:
lights of bright white in formation and changed color to bright red. about 12 to 15 objects. object's were seen on a clear night sky with no clouds, with more then 10 witnesses recording with their cell phones. they moved from east to west.

i was scared because it was no air plane and or helicopter. didnt have any caracteristics of any airplane or helicopter i seen.
the object's seem to disappear even though there were lights after heading west.
content.summary: Objects in managua
